Title: Campus Life on the West Side

Kresge.Body: This is Kresge College, founded in 1971. The theme for this place is Power and Representation.

Porter.Body: This is Porter College, founded in 1969. The theme for this place is Ars Longa, Vita Brevis: Life is Short, Art Endures.

Rachel Carson.Body: Rachel Carson College, founded in 1972. The theme for this place is Environment and Society. I like this place because it has a basketball court.

Oakes.Body: Oakes College, founded in 1972. The theme for this place is Communicating Diversity for a Just Society.

Beyond.Body: Grass, don't forget to check for ticks! Don't fall into any ravines either.
